overview: When the crew of the Hermes finds itself trapped in a space battle with the evil Calinar breaching their ship they must fight for their lives while Arina Kartades still has strange visions of her master Yuni on Deridia Prime.
tagline: Blade of Honor is an epic and bold science fiction which brings together the talent and experience from successful productions such as Star Trek: Deep Space Nine, Battlestar Galactica, Heroes.
title: Blade Of Honor
